name: Classic Mahjong Solitaire
description:
Mahjong Solitaire game in a fresh look and 32 boards to play on.

Every game is composed of 144 stones placed in 4 layers. Player's goal is to always find 2 identical stones while both must be free of bound to be possible to remove them. The game ends once all stones are removed from the playing board.

Every game is unique - stones on playing board are being generated automatically for every new game. A player can select board variant and game difficulty - the process of stones generation on the board. There is possible to play also game without possible end.

The game has implemented auto-save which keep active the last played game until it's not finished.

The game is playable right in the browser on any device.

Classic Mahjong Solitaire belong between classic mahjong games.

Control with mouse or touchscreen.

Hot keys:

T = HINT

U = UNDO

N = RESTART

P = PAUSE

I = INFO

Have fun!
